meanings.definition: A type of neckline on a garment that is wide and shallow, resembling the shape of a boat.
meanings.sent1: She loved the boatnecks on her tops because they made her neck look longer.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer included boatnecks in the new collection for a modern touch.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone admired her boatnecks and joked that they could sail away.
meanings.sent4: Her boatnecks were like little boats floating on the sea of fashion.
meanings.sent5: The boatnecks framed her face elegantly, drawing attention to her smile.

meanings.definition: The plural form of boatneck, referring to multiple garments with boatneck necklines.
meanings.sent1: The store had a sale on boatnecks, so she bought one in every color.
meanings.sent2: Her closet was filled with boatnecks, perfect for any casual occasion.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her boatnecks multiplied in the closet overnight.
meanings.sent4: In her wardrobe, the boatnecks stood out like a fleet of stylish ships.
meanings.sent5: The boatnecks in her collection were versatile and always in fashion.
